metadata.title: CVE-2019-15048 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the AP4_RtpAtom class at Core/Ap4RtpAtom.cpp.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
